cast.name: 米歇尔·奥巴马 Michelle Obama

this_title: Michelle Obama: Life After the White House
trans_title: 米歇尔·奥巴马：白宫之后的生活
introduction: Former First Lady MICHELLE OBAMA'S story has just begun. The Obamas have remained quite busy with their new life of activism which includes their issue-oriented production company, Higher Ground, which won an Oscar for Best Documentary in 2020. Mrs. Obama's autobiography, Becoming, has become the best-selling memoir of all time and even won a Grammy following the publication of her book. Get lost in the incredible journey of this modern-day First Lady's story in the making.
chinese_title: 米歇尔·奥巴马：白宫之后的生活
foreign_title: Michelle Obama: Life After the White House
